model.name: Recovery Branch Creation - MinimalONCE Already Major Violation
model.description: TRON identified that even MinimalONCE was a major Web4 violation. Created dev/destroyed-once branch to attempt recovery without further breaking dev/once. Need to find pre-MinimalONCE working state.
model.rationale: MinimalONCE was already a major violation, not the solution. Need isolated branch to attempt recovery without destroying more work on dev/once.
acceptance_criteria: Create dev/destroyed-once branch for recovery attempts
Identify what was actually working before violations
Do not further break dev/once branch

violation_timeline_correction.reality: MinimalONCE was already major Web4 violation
candidates: b3cad6de - ONCE seamless execution success (but mentions StandaloneONCE)
017401bb - Fix critical build issues with seamless execution
Earlier commits before any Standalone/Minimal violations

model.implementation_notes: Recovery must be attempted in isolation. MinimalONCE was not the solution but part of the problem.
